flawed_nl_solution:
The second student guessed 800 because 8 x 100 = <<800=800>>800
The third guessed 6000 because 800 - 200 = <<800-200=6000>>6000
The total guesses of the first three is 6900 because 100 + 800 + 6000 = <<100+800+6000=6900>>6900
The average of the first three guesses is 2300 because 6900 / 3 = <<6900/3=2300>>2300
The fourth student guessed 2325 because 2300 + 25 = <<2300+25=2325>>2325
#### 2325

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 600, not 6000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
